author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve plumbing tip…it’s important to get the brass nipple level for this drop ear. Here’s why, the supply elbow will sit flush against my tile and have a watertight seal. If you’re adding a shower wand to your shower this is something to remember. This full tutorial is inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com👍🏽🔥#plumbing #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Valve Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
